title: Food is good!!
comment: The food brings back so many memories as a students. It's is truly an emergency food that helps when you have no time and needs something to eat quickly

title: Food is not as it seems...
comment: The food is good but there are lack of meet or eggs so it is pretty plain, lame and boring...

title: Thank you so much for this food!!!
comment: Recently, I have been struggling with the Deadlines and I have to stuck in the library...thanks to this food, not only it is free but it helps me get energy to keep rushing the deadline
